|brand = Netgear |model = FA310TX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = D2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/11/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_FA310TX_rev_D2 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 11ad |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = 1385 |subdevice_id = f004 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:A0:CC
|chip1 = Netgear;LC82C169C; |chip2 = Broadcom;BCM5202; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = tulip |windriv =
|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Lite-On |manuf_model = LNE100TX |manuf_rev = (rev 32) |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = has collision LED |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00B86XN7W |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = yes |spdledcolor = yes |leddupcolor = yes |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The ''NETGEAR'' logo (w/ ''Bay Networks'' one underneath), "FA310TX REV-D2", and :"P/N:6804100310 REV:A1" is silkscreened on the board populating this entry :(S/N: FA32B92148364, MAC: 00:A0:CC:61:58:19). The device's MAC has a 00:A0:CC (''[[Lite-On]]'') OUI.. ([[Lite-On LNE100TX]]) :''Lite-On'' is presumed to be the manufacturer.
This device is using a... *''NETGEAR'' branded LC82C169C *''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM5202 KPF Fast Ethernet PHY
[[Category:English Documentation]]
